metadata.title: CVE-2024-24990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When NGINX Plus or NGINX OSS are configured to use the HTTP/3 QUIC module,undisclosed requests can cause NGINX worker processes to terminate.Note: The HTTP/3 QUIC module is not enabled by default and is consideredexperimental. For more information, refer to  Support for QUIC and HTTP/3https://nginx.org/en/docs/quic.html .Note: Software versions which have reached End of Technical Support (EoTS)are not evaluated

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
